document_data.name: ''Wall of Faith''
document_data.mainbody:
The '''''Wall of Faith''''' was a legendary enchanted [[paladin]] shield.

{{quote|''Even against the strength of an army, this shield would still stand tall.''|An excerpt from ''[[Tales from Candlekeep: Tomb of Annihilation]]''}}
document_data.Powers: The ''Wall of Faith'' enhanced divine powers of paladins that carried it to battle and granted them impenetrable defense against the powers of evil.
document_data.Notable Owners: *[[Dragonbait]]: a [[saurial]] paladin and [[Artus Cimber]]'s companion in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
